item.title: Ricky Martin Praises Bad Bunny Ahead of Super Bowl LX Halftime Show: 'You Won by Staying True to Puerto Rico'
item.description: Martin wrote about Bad Bunny's success and latest Grammy wins in an open letter for the Puerto Rican newspaper El Nuevo Día on Tuesday, Feb. 3

item.title: Nelson Peltz Breaks His Silence on Feud Between Daughter Nicola and the Beckhams, Calls Son-in-Law Brooklyn 'Great'
item.description: Nelson shared his advice to Nicola and Brooklyn during the WSJ Invest Live event: "Stay the hell out of the press"

item.title: Celebrity Surrogacy Consultant Debunks Misconception That Stars Use Surrogates for ‘Vanity Reasons’ (Exclusive)
item.description: Stephanie Levich of Family Match Consulting shares what really goes behind many of the choices to use gestational carriers

item.title: Zoë Kravitz Plans to Join Harry Styles on Tour When She Can This Year: Source (Exclusive)
item.description: Grammy winner Styles, who heads on tour in May, and actor-director Kravitz have been spending time together since last summer

item.title: John McEnroe's Son Writes Moving Essay About Relating to Nick Reiner: 'It's Difficult to Be Anonymous as the Son of Someone'
item.description: The author wrote an article for The Small Bow about watching Nick and Rob Reiner's film 'Being Charlie,' and being able to relate to aspects of Nick R...
